August 7, 2022

Johannes Urpelainen and I published a note for Brookings about the need for federal action to help fossil fuel workers find new jobs -- a key element of a just transition. The paper is [here](https://www.brookings.edu/research/enable-a-just-transition-for-american-fossil-fuel-workers-through-federal-action/).
